name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Slideshow listing bento lunch gift participants with 'Step and Go!!' playing in the background.
Slideshow listing flower stand gift participants with 'Beyond' and a medley of other songs playing.
Informational title cards and event logo for the 8th Anniversary Party 'Starry Bl∞min''.
Further listing of gift participants with 'Soramichi' playing.

subtitles.original: 【お弁当】差し入れ参加者様
subtitles.english: [Bento Lunch] Refreshment Gift Participants

subtitles.original: 君と明かす夜会
subtitles.english: A night party spent with you

subtitles.original: 明日もまた同じ
subtitles.english: Tomorrow too, if the same

subtitles.original: 朝日が昇るなら
subtitles.english: morning sun rises

subtitles.original: 青く光る夜会
subtitles.english: A blue shining night party

subtitles.original: 星空のミラーボール
subtitles.english: A starry sky mirror ball

subtitles.original: 私を照らして
subtitles.english: Illuminate me

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: The show will begin shortly. Please wait.

subtitles.original: タップで地球揺らすくらい
subtitles.english: Enough to shake the earth with a tap

subtitles.original: ここで踊り明かそう
subtitles.english: Let's dance the night away here

subtitles.original: 【フラスタ】差し入れ参加者様
subtitles.english: [Flower Stand] Refreshment Gift Participants

subtitles.original: 午前5時の夜明けの街で
subtitles.english: In the city at dawn at 5 AM

subtitles.original: なんか独りぼっちな気分
subtitles.english: Feeling somewhat lonely

subtitles.original: ぼんやり眺めるベッド 期待してる
subtitles.english: Gazing blankly at the bed, I'm expecting

subtitles.original: 君の足音を
subtitles.english: the sound of your footsteps

subtitles.original: 触れた手も
subtitles.english: Even touched hands

subtitles.original: 触れられないし
subtitles.english: can't be touched

subtitles.original: 運命の赤い糸なんて 知らないし
subtitles.english: And I don't know about the red thread of fate

subtitles.original: それでも君と繋がっていたい
subtitles.english: Even so, I want to stay connected with you

subtitles.original: 明るくなる空に この想い乗せて
subtitles.english: Placing these feelings on the brightening sky

subtitles.original: 何も見えない
subtitles.english: Nothing can be seen

subtitles.original: 灰色に流れる
subtitles.english: Streaming through the grey

subtitles.original: 雲間から差し込む
subtitles.english: shining through the clouds

subtitles.original: たっぷり深呼吸して
subtitles.english: Taking a deep breath

subtitles.original: 境界線を越える
subtitles.english: I'll cross the boundary

subtitles.original: なんであなたにはできないの？なんてさ
subtitles.english: "Why can't you do it?" they say

subtitles.original: 陰口言われたり 呆れられたり 口角下がる エブリデイ
subtitles.english: People talk behind my back, get fed up; corners of my mouth drop every day

subtitles.original: 電車は私を置き去りにしちゃうし
subtitles.english: The train leaves me behind

subtitles.original: 刃物野菜もスピード早すぎだね
subtitles.english: Knives and vegetables, the speed is just too fast

subtitles.original: ありのままの素敵さだけじゃ足りないんだ Take me
subtitles.english: Just being wonderful as you are isn't enough, Take me

subtitles.original: 毎日死ぬほど頑張ってやっとここまで連れてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I've worked hard enough to die every day to finally bring it this far

subtitles.original: あなたには分からない
subtitles.english: You don't understand

subtitles.original: 分かってほしくない
subtitles.english: I don't want you to understand

subtitles.original: 私の苦労も 雲もどきか ご存知ないでいてね
subtitles.english: My hardships, not even knowing if they are cloud-like, please keep not knowing

subtitles.original: きっとあなたにもできるはず なんてさ
subtitles.english: "Surely you can do it too," they say

subtitles.original: 言うほど無責任にはなりたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to be as irresponsible as saying that

subtitles.original: それでも死ぬほど頑張って駆ける値打ちはあると思った
subtitles.english: Even so, I thought it was worth running and working hard enough to die

subtitles.original: 投げ出したくなるよ でも諦めたくはない
subtitles.english: I want to throw it all away, but I don't want to give up

subtitles.original: 私の未来も
subtitles.english: My future

subtitles.original: 失敗も全部 私だけのもの
subtitles.english: My failures too, they are all mine alone

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださった皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To everyone who sent refreshments, thank you very much!
